snippet.title: Farewell Avalon | Demo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
You can now download Farewell Avalon yourself. Explore the ruins of the Avalonian People and begin the unravelling of Archie's past. 

Itch.io:
https://centennial-game-dev.itch.io/farewell-avalon

After playing the demo, have some feedback you want to share?
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScU4NScLRNI8cd9g8nOU66DIyXFvcQPG8r3badF2XKubtxV4g/viewform

===============+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷===============

Join my discord server to be a part of the c̶u̶l̶t̶ community:
https://discord.gg/SEwPxr6M2v

===============+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷===============

RuKiMi Productions:

Razeacc
Project Management - Music - Story Author

Carina Choy
Design - Visuals - Animation
https://chimera-crafts.itch.io/

Marc Angelo Garcia
Character Design

Leonardo Siqueira Loiola -- Coding, Version Control Management
Itch: https://ultraboo.itch.io/
https://twitter.com/Ultra_BooDev

Knox Fouladi -- Coding, Version Control Management
Itch: https://knoxulla.itch.io/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/knox-fouladi-a7442225a/

Kameron Pearson -- Audio, Coding, Design
Itch: https://kirbochan.itch.io

Adam Howe -- Narrative

Special thanks to:
Farewell Avalon Poster-
@shizukanaarts

===============+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷+-x÷===============

"The Avalonian people, a proud nomadic civilization that committed an exodus from Khueen's nation early-on during its nascence due to a difference in how their mortals viewed the archgods. Rather than fighting for their freedom, the gentle archgod at the time willingly granted them this fate. 
The leader of this exodus was an archgod named ███████. Despite being one of weakest, she managed to lead her people for centuries to come, creating outposts in search for their promised land.
What became of them is currently classified."
- The Agent
